attributes.content: I've gained a general understanding of this Infected's behavioral patterns. Despite his now exceptional Infected state, his actions still obey some kind of law.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: In regards to stimulatory measures, he possesses distinct methods of resolving stressors, which likely are leftovers of habitual thought from his previous human form.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Mutations in his infected organs have emerged within this same line: control, as well as be controlled.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Violence's cyclical nature has no potential to be undermined. To force, as well as to be forced, beat upon their skin in cyclic fashion.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: In following, I will attempt to eliminate the possibility he may, owing to his exceptional Infected status, have any negative effect whatsoever on other organisms.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I will render his infected organs harmless, halt those organs' action, and destroy their basic function.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: As a doctor, that is all I am required to do.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Even if we set the entire district ablaze, it would only serve to further disperse what exceptional Originium crystal makeup has already arisen, and bring about even more exceptional infection in turn. This operation is necessary.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Once this series of tasks is complete, he can return to being a normal Infected.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Only, the mutation of his infected organs has already dealt irreversible damage to his bodily function. The rate and degree of infection of his various physiological systems can only accelerate from here on.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: He is already terminal; in end-state. The world has already abandoned him.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: This is the fate left for him. The only thing the world has for every single Infected.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: Is this the only method of treatment?

attributes.content: From a medical perspective, yes.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: However, even if I were to look past my position as a doctor, I still would not have any participation in any facet of administration beyond, regarding Reunion Infected.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: We don't have much time. Whether or not he can awaken from his coma hinges entirely on how his physiological condition fares following operation.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Following the conclusion of the Chernobog core city operation, we'll be completely disavowing any relationship with the Reunion Movement.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: This is a necessary piece of that puzzle.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Put simply, the numerous lives this Infected's organs are tied to, and his own fate, are nothing to do with Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: You can make some sort of choice.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: The power to choose has always been in your hands, Doctor. The majority of the time, we've had no time to review the consequences of our choices, and nothing more.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: But before you make a choice, you should clearly ascertain their outcomes.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: â€”Should you regard him as an Infected patient? Or should you regard him as one of Reunion's past leaders?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: If you regard him as a microcosm of all the evil that runs riot across this land, is he a casualty, or a perpetrator?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Should you regard him as an inseparable part of some kind of violent regime, or should you regard him as the lamentable outcome of some hideous logic?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: In reality, these identities are all fundamentally inseparable. But we don't have the capacity to accommodate them all.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Whether you let him run his own course in the core city, or regard him as the ringleader of the Infected violence and apply grave consequences to him in the name of present society, or perhaps take him as an acutely ill patient to proceed down a humanitarian path of treatment...
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Whether rationally passing judgment and deciding life or death, or directly confronting your own cognition to issue judgment that exceeds our scope of authority, these are all things you can do.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Factually, he has already vanished from this land. Only you can decide his fate, whether fortune or misfortune.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Whether benevolent, or just, or fair, or resentful, or whether you'd like all four, or whether your decision has nothing to do with these words at all, it doesn't matter to me.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I won't issue any evaluation on your choices. Even if I would, I wouldn't speak it.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Even if making choices for other people's fates is a ridiculous, laughable affair...
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: He's already made his choice.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: What should be done next, hinges only on you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I'm only a doctor meeting the patient for the first time. But you are the Doctor who's fought against him numerous times.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Your understanding should be deeper than mine. Do what you should do.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: This is to be your own verdict, and not mine.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: ...Or perhaps, Dr. {@nickname}, you already settled on a choice long ago?
attributes.name: Kal
